description: Withanalage Bimal Wickramarathne Vs. The Hon. Attorney General before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Withanalage Bimal Wickramarathne Vs. The Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Rape of a minor – A witness may forget details over time, witnesses are less likely to recall specific details accurately or may confuse them with other events affecting the coherence of their testimonies – The compelling and interconnected pieces of evidence provide powerful and independent corroboration of the witnesses detailed narrative of rape by the appellant
legistation: - Section 364(2) of the Penal Code (Amendment) Act No.22 of 1995
